data.text: @DrTomFrieden this is “medical education for everyone” at its finest. Humble, optimistic but realistic, clear and on message. Thank you Dr. Frieden!
@DrTomFrieden Ivermectin is one of the tools
@Cheryll1950 @DrTomFrieden Yes. Death seems very “appetizing” to him. https://t.co/jB4eLtidPZ

@DrTomFrieden One of the most effective tools that we had were masks, yet the CDC’s announcement just assured that most people will not wear one. You all are just as complicit in preventable deaths as trump was. Stop gaslighting like you care! https://t.co/v7paWu0CMC

@DrTomFrieden We aren’t using them. No mask mandates, no remote learning. We’ve come to the 🤷🏻‍♀️😵🤐 part of the pandemic. We are letting loud, uneducated toddlers throwing a tantrum lead our policy-making.
@DrTomFrieden I don’t think so. Mandates are being lifted, CDC is sending the wrong message, people are not adhering to any guidelines at all, and nobody believes it’s airborne. Very disappointing
@DrTomFrieden If only we would really use those tools instead of just dropping them prematurely

@DrTomFrieden This high risk senior knows what's coming for her and it's not a return to the full active life lived precovid. It's more of staying at home, being unable to return to work and worrying about exposure everytime I need milk. Thanks CDC.
